question: "Fig Tree Beach" and "Nissi Beach" are the most popular tourist destinations of the Mediterranean region located in which nation?
explanation: Fig Tree Bay and Nissi Beach are the most popular tourist destinations of the Mediterranean region located in Cyprus facing the Mediterranean Sea. Fig Tree Bay is a sandy beach ranked always among one of the ten best beaches in the world. It is a popular tourist destination for families. Nissi Beach is located in Ayia Napa beach resort of Cyprus. This beach have been awarded a "blue flag" destination.
